{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Deco |revision=P7 v1.x |series=AC1300 |asin=B07GFVB7H1;GB; |fcc_date=03/14/2019 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=Powerline Access Point, wireless system, |fcc_id=TE7P7 |ic_id=8853A-P7 |pcb_id=2050500881 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=USB Type-C |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;IPQ4019, 0VV, NKQPJR, E161100; |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q256CFIG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB Type-C, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019;IPQ4019, 0VV, NKQPJR, E161100; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4019;IPQ4019, 0VV, NKQPJR, E161100; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072;Q, QCA8072, 0VV, PEP3449, K154600; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz RF Power Amplifier IC;RFMD;RFPA5542;>>>, PA5542, ONBR;2;,,, HomePlug AFE/Line Driver;Atheros;AR1540;;1; ,,, Bluetooth 4.2 Chip;Qualcomm (CSR);CSR8811;8811, A12U, 80GN5N;1; |flags=256QAM, Alexa, IFTTT, Bluetooth 4.2, HomePlug AV2 600, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Whole Home Hybrid Mesh Wi-Fi System}} ''AC1300 Dual-Band Wi-Fi + AV600 PowerLine'' :{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/Deco-P7.html}} "16072028-1.0 Rev:1.0sp4 A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The device itself does not contain any [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Power_line_communication PLC] components. Powerline is handled within the wall-plug power supply itself which has its own MAC address on the label. It probably contains a [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA7450 + AR1540. {{hasPowerSupply |brand=TP-Link |model=T120120 |revision=-2B5 |input_v=120-240 |input_a=0.4 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15 |output_v=5, 12 |output_a=1.2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=Male USB Type-C |style=large, vertical |manuf_country=China }} *[https://www.tp-link.com/us/support/alexa-compatibility/ ''Alexa Compatibility for TP-Link Wi-Fi products'' on '''TP-LINK'''] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.mbreviews.com/tp-link-deco-p7-review/ ''TP-LINK Deco P7 Review'' on '''MB|Reviews'''] (Spec.) :"2050500881" is silkscreened on the main board. :32 MiB Winbond W25Q256JVFQ Flash, 256 MiB RAM ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M4R]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M5]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M6 v1.0]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M9 Plus V1]] *[[TP-LINK Deco P7 v1.x]] *[[TP-LINK HC220-G1]] *[[TP-LINK M53]] __NOTOC__
